sentences.en: A forensic team was hunting for clues.
sentences.cn: 法医小组正在搜寻线索。

sentences.en: A leopard hunts alone, and an injured leopard cannot hunt.
sentences.cn: 豹向来单独猎食，所以如果受伤了就无法捕猎。

sentences.en: As a child I learned to hunt and fish.
sentences.cn: 从小我就学会了打猎和捕鱼。

sentences.en: Capt. Hunt asked which engine was on fire.
sentences.cn: 亨特船长问哪个发动机起火了。

sentences.en: Detectives are busy hunting for clues.
sentences.cn: 侦探们忙着寻找线索。

sentences.en: I'll try and hunt out the information you need.
sentences.cn: 我会努力找到你要的信息。

sentences.en: If you come to Beijing again, remember to hunt me out.
sentences.cn: 如果你再到北京来, 别忘了来找我.

sentences.en: It took her four months to hunt him down.
sentences.cn: 她花了4个月才把他找出来。

sentences.en: John Hunt, familiarly known to his friends as Jack
sentences.cn: 约翰∙亨特，朋友昵称他为杰克

sentences.en: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.cn: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.en: Lions sometimes hunt alone.
sentences.cn: 狮子有时单独猎食。

sentences.en: Major General William Hunt
sentences.cn: 陆军少将威廉∙亨特

sentences.en: Parent birds began to hunt for food for their young.
sentences.cn: 亲鸟开始为幼鸟寻找食物。

sentences.en: Steve Vickers was yellow-carded for a foul on Hunt.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫·维克斯因对亨特犯规被出示黄牌。

sentences.en: The couple had helped in the hunt for the toddlers.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇曾帮着搜寻那些幼童。

sentences.en: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.cn: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.en: The police are still hunting the killer.
sentences.cn: 警方仍在追捕杀人凶手。

sentences.en: the slopes where I hunted deer as a kid
sentences.cn: 我儿时猎鹿的山坡

sentences.en: They went to the island to hunt the buried treasure.
sentences.cn: 他们到岛上去寻找埋藏的宝物.

sentences.en: We must hunt out all the facts we can.
sentences.cn: 我们必须尽可能查清全部事实.

sentences.en: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.cn: 狼往往成群捕猎。

sentences.en: You'll have to hunt up the word in the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 你须在字典里查找这个字.

phrases.tran_cn: 寻物游戏（参加者在规定的时间内寻找指定的物品，以先找到者或先找到的队为胜）

trans.tran_en: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them

trans.tran_cn: 打猎； 搜寻， 寻找； 驱逐， 追逐， 追捕
trans.tran_en: to look for someone or something very carefully
to hunt  foxes  as a sport, riding on horses and using dogs

trans.tran_cn: 寻找； 狩猎， 猎取
trans.tran_en: to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them
